forum.forumDescription:
Thank you for installing the MediaWizards forum package. We hope you enjoy this great tool to support your organization!

Many thanks go out to Kevin Jump for the original source code and to all the members of Our Umbraco at http://our.umbraco.com/forum for helping to test.
This forum gives you a chance to become more familiar with how this product responds to different features and keeps testing in one place instead of posting tests all over. Happy Posting!

forumPost.postBody:
Just a test for quotes

Reply with quote

forumAuthHolder.title: Membership Holder page, does not do anything.

register.title: Create a new account.
register.message:
Registration is not required to view current topics on the Forum; however, if you wish to post a new topic or reply to an existing topic registration is required. Registration is free and only takes a few minutes. The only required fields are your Username, which may be your real name or a nickname, and a valid email address.

 

The information you provide during registration is not outsourced or used for any advertising by us. If you believe someone is sending you advertisements as a result of the information you provided through your registration, please notify us immediately.

login.title: Forum Login
login.message: Don't have an account? You can register for one here

profile.title: Update your account.
profile.message: If you change your email address an email will be sent to the new address to validate it is real, your account will be locked until you use the verification link.

reset.title: Forgot your password?
reset.message: An email will be sent to your email address to validate it is real, please use the link in the email to reset your password.
reset.postMessage: Please create a new password using the form below.

GenericProperty.Name: Post At Root
GenericProperty.Description: Can users post at this level (or is this a container for other forums?)

GenericProperty.Name: Page Size
GenericProperty.Description: Number of posts to show on a page

GenericProperty.Name: Restricted Posting
GenericProperty.Description: Only members of these groups can post in this forum (default is everyone)

GenericProperty.Name: Restricted Viewing
GenericProperty.Description: Only members of these groups can view posts in this forum (default is everyone)

GenericProperty.Name: Post Creator
GenericProperty.Description: Name of the user who created the post, stored in case the Member is deleted.

GenericProperty.Name: Deleted By Author
GenericProperty.Description: Set if the author deleted the post, otherwise assume it was an Administrator or Moderator

GenericProperty.Name: Stickiness
GenericProperty.Description: How sticky (to the top) is this post - the higher the better

GenericProperty.Name: Domain Blacklist
GenericProperty.Description: Do not allow these domains to register

GenericProperty.Name: Default Membership
GenericProperty.Description: Member groups to assign when registerring
